forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Emit & Sound delay tuning

comments.text: Hi! Here's what's new in Update 155.3 (you're on [version])! Thx Thifa!
The minimum time between a part emitting things is now down from 0.2s to 0.05s.
The minimum time between playing the same sound twice is now also down from 0.2s to 0.05s.
Please let us know if things are working fine for you!

thread.latestCommentText: Please let us know if things are working fine for you!
